p:
The 20 qRT-PCR-positive DENV2 samples were subjected to viral genomic amplification at the Institute of Tropical Medicine, University of SÃ£o Paulo, Brazil. Genome sequencing was conducted using the portable nanopore MinION sequencing platform, which has been used previously in Brazil during outbreaks of Zika virus and yellow fever virus.

11 Sequencing was performed using a multiplex PCR primer scheme designed to amplify the entire coding region of DENV2 as previously described.
